name: Door Hell...??
description:
Door hell is an escape game with lots of doors with only one door as an exit. Opening an incorrect door will start firing bullets.  Your health will degrade with each bullet hit.  You can try opening another door after waiting 4 sec. 

As time passes, the room gets smaller and the bullets will bounce around the smaller area eventually hitting you,  so you need to find the correct door as quickly as you can to exit.

The number of doors in each room increases as you move through the levels

The controls of the game are W A S D or arrow keys.

Enjoy Door Hell...

The WebGL build seems to be a bit buggy, sorry about that!

This game was a bit rushed at the end, so it is a bit unpolished!

I would recommend checking out the Help screen for instructions before playing the game! The WebGL build does not give the best experience for playing, so if possible, please use the windows download!
